Text: You, somehow managed to make the video less than 640x480 when DVD starts at 720x480. You used 128KB/s MP3 when DVD audio is perfectly transferable to the AVI container, and for a musical no less. If this were an NPR recording or some webcast, 128 would be acceptable, but for Les Mis? I do not think so. Also, where are the subtitles? I understand the point of this "rip" is to make the filesize smaller and make it more accessible, but you could have done much better.
Les MisĂŠrables (1995 film) in english please....
